00024 class DefaultAccumulationFunction : AccumulationFunction {
00025 
00026 private:
00027         DefaultAccumulationParams accumulationParams_;
00028 
00029 public:
00030         DefaultAccumulationFunction(void);
00031 
00032         int f(const RealVector & u, RealVector & v);
00033         int df(const RealVector & u, JacobianMatrix & v);
00034         int d2f(const RealVector & u, HessianMatrix & v);
00035         
00036         // These functions just create aliases f, df, d2f functions
00037         int h(const RealVector & u, RealVector & v)      { return f(u, v); }
00038         int dh(const RealVector & u, JacobianMatrix & v) { return df(u, v); }
00039         int d2h(const RealVector & u, HessianMatrix & v) { return d2f(u, v); }
00040 
00041         const DefaultAccumulationParams & accumulationParams(void);
00042         void accumulationParams(const DefaultAccumulationParams & accumulationParams);
00043 
00044 };

00047 inline DefaultAccumulationFunction::DefaultAccumulationFunction(void)
00048         : accumulationParams_(DefaultAccumulationParams())
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 inline int DefaultAccumulationFunction::f(const RealVector & u, RealVector & v)
00053 {
00054         v = u;
00055         return OK;
00056 }
00057 
00058 inline int DefaultAccumulationFunction::df(const RealVector & u, JacobianMatrix & v)

00064         //v.equals_multiple_of_identity(1.);
00065         return OK;
00066 }
00067 
00068 inline int DefaultAccumulationFunction::d2f(const RealVector & u, HessianMatrix & v)
00069 {
00070         v = * new HessianMatrix(u.size());
00071         return OK;
00072 }
